name: ionic4-remote-devtool
description: > Note:    > This explanation below explains everything using ngrx as exampe but it works exactly the same way with ngxs.   > The only difference is the interface to implement (`NgxsDevtoolsExtension` instead of `ReduxDevtoolsExtensionConnection `)    > You can find ngxs template files in the repo. ## how does it work?
